info.description: This is the API documentation for the AlgoHive API
info.title: Swagger AlgoHive API

get.description: Get all APIs, only accessible to users with the API_ENV permission
Check if the sent cookie token session is still valid and return user data
get.summary: Check if the sent cookie token session is still valid and return user data

post.description: Authenticate a user and return a JWT token
Logout a user by invalidating their token

get.description: Get all groups, only accessible to users with the GROUPS permission

post.description: Create a group, only accessible to users with the GROUPS permission

put.description: Update a group name and description
put.summary: Update a group name and description

delete.description: Delete a group and cascade delete all users and competitions associated with the group
delete.summary: Delete a group and cascade delete all users and competitions associated with the group

post.description: Add a user to a group
post.summary: Add a user to a group

delete.description: Remove a user from a group
delete.summary: Remove a user from a group

get.description: Get all scopes, only accessible to users with the SCOPES permission

post.description: Create a scope, only accessible to users with the SCOPES permission

get.description: Get a scope, only accessible to users with the SCOPES permission

put.description: Update a scope, only accessible to users with the SCOPES permission

delete.description: Delete a scope, only accessible to users with the SCOPES permission

post.description: Attach the scope to a role, only accessible to users with the SCOPES permission
post.summary: Attach the scope to a role

delete.description: Detach the scope from a role, only accessible to users with the SCOPES permission
delete.summary: Detach the scope from a role

post.description: Create a new user and attach a group to it
post.summary: Create User and attach a Group

post.description: Create multiple new users and attach a group to them
post.summary: Create Bulk Users and attach a Group

get.description: Get the profile information of the authenticated user

put.description: Update the profile information of the authenticated user

post.description: Create a new user and attach roles to it
post.summary: Create a new user and attach roles

post.description: Attach a Role to a User
post.summary: Attach a Role to a User

delete.description: Detach a Role from a User
delete.summary: Detach a Role from a User

Bearer.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
Bearer.name: Authorization
